addLoanLock(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: addLoanLock to the user and locks their collateral asset

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Depositing to the account can be handled by any wallet

isBridger().notice: bridgers have the ability to bridge assets either on chain or offchain, that means they can make bridge requests to the protocol

loans(address,address).notice: loans - account loans from different lending pools

removeLoanLock(address,address,uint256,u.notice: repay a loan, the user unlocks their assets to be tradable

updateBridgingStatus(bool).notice: updateBridgingStatus: - set to either true or false to allow briding of assets on chain or off chain

withdraw(address,uint256,address).notice: Withdrawals handled by protocol to a wallet that's been pre specified offchain
